contest-event.event-date:
April 27, 1975 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Civic Hall, Holmfirth March contest - 1st Lockwood. Hymn tune contest - Slaithwaite. Best cornet - F.Shepley (Boarshurst). Best basses - Lockwood. Best section 3 or 4 band - Marsden.
April 4, 2012, 8:44 p.m. May 12, 2014, 7:41 a.m.
1 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson
2 Boarshurst Silver Band Bryan Garside
3 Hade Edge Jack Fisher
4 Slaithwaite Band Malcolm Simpson
Unknown Result Marsden Silver Prize Band Herbert H. Howarth
Unknown Result Scapegoat Hill Unknown
Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band I. Linford
